description.value:
Utility (built into module). Opens the Garou form picker to switch between Homid, Glabro, Crinos, Hispo, and Lupus.

Easiest: Open this item's sheet and click Choose Form in the header â€” no other modules needed.

Optional: With Item Macro (Override preUseItem Hook), using the item from the sheet runs the dialog. You can also drag the world macro Garou: Choose Form to your hotbar.

macro.name: Choose Garou Form
macro.command: const macro = game.macros.find(m => m.name === "Garou: Choose Form"); if (macro) await macro.execute(false, [{ actor: this.actor || this.item?.actor, token: this.token, item: this.item }]);
